headline: Investigation Witnesses Are Celebrated, and Denounced, for Speaking Out
abstract: Some have been cheered again by admirers while others are drawing a new round of insults and invective from supporters of Mr. Trump — and even from the president himself.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Admirers still stop and thank them on the street and in airports, send fan mail and sometimes even offer to pay for their meals. But supporters of President Trump still insult and threaten them online — even the ones who work in the White House.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
